recipe.title: Creamsicle Crush
ingredients: 4 cups shaved ice (made with the grater blade of a food processor)
instructions: In a small pitcher, mix orange juice concentrate, Grand Marnier, and vanilla vodka. Stir to combine. Using an ice cream scoop, pack approximately 1 cup shaved ice into a paper snow cone cup (or cocktail glass), then drizzle with a quarter of the creamsicle mixture. Repeat with remaining ice.
